featured.text: The ice sheets, which once spanned 20 square kilometers, are thinning over five times as quickly compared to a few years ago.
A west-to-east journey, on the other hand, makes us late compared to the local time.
According to some studies, how often do men interrupt as compared with women?
This eco-friendly leather has clear 24 for the environment, compared to real leather and synthetic leathers.

definition.en_def: To examine the similarities and differences between two or more items.
definition.example: We need to compare the prices of these two products before making a decision.
